name: DGCP MaMeeFarm Proof 443 — Limited Meals Supporting System & Farm Labor
description:
This record documents a labor meal at MaMeeFarm.

The image shows a simple meal consisting of rice topped with
stir-fried Chinese cabbage and pork sausage (moo yor).
This meal is part of a limited food supply,
counted as one of ten meals sustaining the day's labor.

The food supports both physical farm work
and ongoing system-building activities under constrained resources.

Timestamp and DGCP watermark are embedded directly in the image.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
